channel.title: Failure to load Player after adding member status
channel.description:
well i added member status based off of a donator status that i had on another server, but when i try to log out my server prompt says this [code]Your server is now online. Connection from *ip address*:49219 Totalpk: character file not found. Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Totalpk. java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 20 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:19517) at client.logout(client.java:11389) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:76) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16846) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18363) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error with player 1, Totalpk java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 20 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:19517) at client.logout(client.java:11389) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:383) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:375) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:288) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 Connection from *ip address*:49226 [client-1-Totalpk]: Failed to load player: Totalpk ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (*ip address*)[/code]
these are the codes i added in my client.java
[code] } else if (token.equals("character-member")) { member = Integer.parseInt(token2);[/code]
[code] } else if (token.equals("character-member")) { member = Integer.parseInt(token2);[/code]
[code] characterfile.write("character-member = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(member), 0, Integer.toString(member).length()); characterfile.newLine();[/code] and i also added this to my player.java
[code]public int member;[/code] I get no errors when i compile its just i get that message in my server prompt and then my characters file is empty and i have to delete the file before i can log back into it. Does anybody have any idea what i am doing wrong?

item.title: Failure to load Player after adding member status
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

ok so should i change it to like 15 or something?
or what should i change?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2009, 05:16:28 pm[/size][hr]alrighty nvm i think i solved it thank alot i feel really stupid XD

Read full topic
item.source: Failure to load Player after adding member status

@d_man103456 wrote:

well i added member status based off of a donator status that i had on another server, but when i try to log out my server prompt says this

Your server is now online. Connection from *ip address*:49219 Totalpk: character file not found. } else if (token.equals("character-member")) { member = Integer.parseInt(token2);

} else if (token.equals("character-member")) { member = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("character-member = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(member), 0, Integer.toString(member).length()); characterfile.newLine();

I get no errors when i compile its just i get that message in my server prompt and then my characters file is empty and i have to delete the file before i can log back into it.
